fields.name: Kind
fields.description: Indicates the kind of algorithm used for partitioning. For MultiHash, multiple partition keys (upto three maximum) are supported for container create

fields.name: Paths
fields.description: List of paths using which data within the container can be partitioned

fields.name: SystemKey
fields.description: Indicates if the container is using a system generated partition key

fields.name: Version
fields.description: Indicates the version of the partition key definition
